author: Edward McPartland
description: Essentially a gin and tonic bomb. To quote a Portobello Star regular, "the thinking man's Jager Bomb".
name: Tonic Boom

recipeInstructions.text: POUR tonic water into old-fashioned glass
Then POUR gin into shot glass
Instruct drinker to hold gin-filled shot glass directly over surface of tonic water and drop shot into old-fashioned glass and consume
